column5: My son just gave me a Black Cat heater from CTC and I was wondering how it would work in an ice hut or would I be better to exchange it for another brand, Mr Heater etc.
I had the black cat heater - took it back and got the Mr. Heater - more BTU'S . Much happier with the Mr. Heater Buddy.   Don
It works fine I have one it heats my 2 man Frabill very well it will do a nice job.Tracker is right though the Mr.Buddy I hear is great.My cousin Percher says its the best bang fot the buck. Mike

I've heard the Mr. heater is way better. I have the Black cat and even on the really cold days and eves it is suffient enough to take the chill out. But then again My blood is like tar and I think I'm part eskimo or something....maybe its just that I AM CANADIAN.
